title: Can I play LoL on two computers?
body:
well I posted this earlier but in the wrong section so it got deleted. rip

Was just wondering if I can play on my LoL account on two separate computers now that I got a new desktop. I still want to be able to play on my laptop for when I go out. Just wondering since I know there are pretty strict rules regarding account sharing and was worried the game might think I'm sharing my account when it's just me. Or do I have to stick with on computer? That would suck.

replies.body: It's totally fine to play League from separate computers!  As long as you're not being shady or trying to have someone else play on your account, then there's nothing to worry about.  I do, however, encourage you to make sure your [account security is strengthened](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account), that way you can play safely throughout different devices.
Thank you so much for the response! Answered what I wanted to know thanks. :)

Yes and no
No they can't be logged on at the same time it logs the other one out
Yes u can have it on 2 different computers

You are free to play your account from any number of computers you wish. Riot knows people do this and you will not be flagged as sharing your account just for that, unless your behavior is changing dramatically and consistently when doing so or something like that.

Just know that if you play on someone else's PC that they may have viruses or programs which may compromise your account, so be wary of that.
